content: **crocheted blanket with zig-zags and stripes in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-799 yarn group c or a+a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 80 cm length approx 125 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 64 amethyst 100 g colour 66 plum 100 g colour 62 sage green 100 g colour 25 moss green 100 g colour 61 lime 100 g colour 17 off white 100 g colour 41 mustard 100 g colour 65 rust 100 g colour 63 desert rose **crochet gauge ** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
